content: the lattice love set includes a beanie wristlets leg warmers and infinity scarf the woven stitches create a gorgeous effect the beanie pattern is free on the heart hook home blog https //hearthookhome com/lattice-love-beanie-crochet-pattern/ the pdf includes the entire set there is a full video tutorial for the beanie which will assist should you need help on the wristlets or leg warmers as well https //www youtube com/watch v=iledbv8n_je
